attributes.additional_details:
The EU is a totalitarian regime that has no place in the modern world.

It has its origins in Germany and is driven by a desire to dominate Europe.

The EU is a corrupt and unelected body and we in England have been subjugated against our will.

When you deny people freedom and the right to choose their own destiny, you invite violence.

You deny us the vote but hold a referendum as a political sop to a Party we didn't vote into power. There are no words to describe this action; except perhaps treachery.

You must give the people of England an immediate referendum as you have a responsibility to represent the will of the electorate.
